column1: Smoque BBQ////not sure if it's because I was tired...but I have the feeling that they just want you to get out of there as soon as you can. This is definitely not a place to sit and enjoy your meal
column2: but a place for you to eat and go! I order the sliced brisket sandwich which was OK
column5: BF ordered the pulled pork and he liked it
column6: fingers liked and all. Can't complain about the waiting time
column7: 5 min top on a busy night. Personally I prefer to sit
